carousel.desc_1: A transparent, sustainable, smart mango supply chain platform that connects farms to consumers effectively.
carousel.desc_2: Selected from the biggest, ripest, and sweetest mangoes for domestic and export markets.
carousel.desc_3: Mangoes are managed by QR code for easy traceability of harvest time and origin.
carousel.desc_4: Green production process – Connecting farmers across provinces.

homepage.mango_desc_1: When it comes to tropical fruits, mangoes are always worth mentioning. In Vietnam, mangoes are grown from North to South, mostly concentrated from Binh Dinh southward, and especially in the Mekong Delta provinces such as Ben Tre, Tien Giang, Dong Thap, Vinh Long, and Can Tho. Vietnam ranks 13th in the world in mango production.
homepage.mango_desc_2: With many years of experience in exporting mangoes, Chanh Thu has been and will continue to bring mangoes to consumers around the world. Ripe mangoes have an attractive yellow color, a sweet and sour taste, and a characteristic aroma. Ripe mangoes contain nutrients such as glucid, protein, lipids, ash, water, and other minerals like calcium, phosphorus, iron, vitamin A, vitamin B1, vitamin C, folic acid, and beta-carotene.
homepage.slogan: Effective solution for your agricultural products
homepage.supply_chain_desc_1: Tien Giang and Dong Thap are two of the 13 provinces in the Mekong River Delta region, with vast mango growing areas cultivated for generations. The 'Cat Hoa Loc' mango is a very famous variety originating from Tien Giang. Many wholesale markets have spontaneously formed and developed here, attracting many traders to come and do business. However, the main consumption market for mangoes is still domestic and China.
homepage.supply_chain_desc_2: Local packaging plays a very important role in coordinating the entire national mango distribution system.
homepage.mission_1: Preferred by customers who care about health and the environment
homepage.mission_2: Providing high-quality products from trusted local farmers
homepage.mission_3_suffix: Green to choose clean, healthy mangoes for yourself
homepage.article_1_title: Global and Vietnam mango production | Techniques for growing and caring for mangoes
homepage.article_2_title: Improving the mango value chain in Dong Thap province
homepage.article_3_title: Building Vietnam’s mango value chain to serve the domestic market and key export markets

cards.cost_satisfaction_desc: Ensure optimal cost at every step in your supply chain, from production to delivery.
cards.support_24_7_desc: Get 24x7 support to keep your supply chain running smoothly anytime, anywhere.
cards.seamless_integration_desc: Easily connect processes in your supply chain with modern tools and technology for smooth operations.
cards.real_time_tracking_desc: Monitor your supply chain in real time with accurate updates, ensuring transparency and control at every step.

about.description: We strive to transform the mango supply chain by providing innovative solutions that ensure quality, efficiency, and sustainability from farm to table. At MSCM, transparency and collaboration are at the heart of everything we do. We simplify and enhance the mango supply chain by empowering farmers, distributors, and retailers through innovative, technology-driven, and data-based solutions.
